conbody.p: If you are running Windows, multicast DNS discovery of a locally running micro cloud will generally not work. You can manually set the mapping for the endpoint and for each application in the Windows hosts file.
conbody.note: Using xip.io for hostname is the easiest way to set up an micro cloud VM if mDNS cannot be used. Try this method before modifying the hosts file.
conbody.p: To modify the hosts file, open %SystemRoot%\System32\drivers\etc\hosts. The hosts file typically contains some comments and one or two entries. Add your new entries to the bottom of the file on separate lines.

Add entries and corresponding IP addresses for the endpoint, the AOK (authentication) endpoint, the logs endpoint, and for each application.
